message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I think it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product, which is closer to the value you mentioned it has. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than $8,500. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $9,000. Let me know if that works for you.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
